submissions.name: The Decline of Yahoo in Its Own Words
submissions.creator: Harvard Business Review
submissions.description: A visualization of mentions of words relating to mobile technology on earnings calls by Yahoo, Google and Microsoft. Renders as a line chart on large screens and a scrollable heatmap on small screens.

submissions.name: How Corporate Boards Connect, in Charts
submissions.creator: Harvard Business Review
submissions.description: I have no idea what you call this kind of thing. A node chart? But it was built in D3, largely from scratch, to visualize the global links between corporate boards across a couple decades.
